info.description:
A TextProcessing provider using a GPT4All Large Language Model by Nomic AI that runs locally on CPU
The models run completely on your machine. No private data leaves your servers.
After installing this app you will need to run
occ llm:download-models
Requirements:
* x86 CPU * GNU lib C (musl is not supported) * Python 3.10+
